The claim referenced two genuine stories: but they were not directly linked or accurately represented in the article. One story mentioned a survey of professors at George Washington University who speculated about the possibility of honoring Obama on a monument in the future, while the other mentioned a Facebook page and a Huffington Post op-ed discussing the idea of putting Obama on Mount Rushmore, but it was clarified that there is no room for additional additions to the monument.
